name: lunem
description:
As a lone knight, wander the eerie randomly generated woods of Lunem by moonlight.

Initial mood prototype for a patient side scrolling action game.

Concept and execution sparked by #PROCJAM.

Disclaimer: Don't expect any conventional gameplay yet! :)

Controls

Keyboard: a+d or arrows to move, z to attack

Xbox controller: analogue stick to move, x to attack
